definitions.definition: A person who stokes , especially one on a steamship or steam train , who stokes coal in the boilers .
A device for stoking a fire; a poker .
A device that feeds coal into a furnace , etc., automatically .
A person who pedals on the back of a tandem bicycle .

main_definition: A person who stokes , especially one on a steamship or steam train , who stokes coal in the boilers .
secondary_definitions: A device for stoking a fire; a poker .
A device that feeds coal into a furnace , etc., automatically .
A person who pedals on the back of a tandem bicycle .
